SEARCH:
Package ch.zhaw.spro.dbcontrollers

Klasse EmployeeDbController

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.spro.dbcontrollers.EmployeeDbController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/employees") public class EmployeeDbController extends Object
This windowcontrollers provides an API for managing employees. It uses Spring annotations to handle HTTP requests and interacts with the EmployeeDbService.

The following endpoints are provided:

  • GET /employees: Retrieve all employees from the database. Returns a list of employees.
  • GET /employees/{id}: Retrieve an employee by their ID. Returns an Optional of the Employee, which is empty if no employee was found.
  • GET /employees/{id}/qualifications: Retrieve all qualifications for an employee by their ID. Returns a list of qualifications.
  • POST /employees: Create a new employee. Returns the created employee.
  • POST /employees/{id}/qualifications: Add a qualification to an employee. Returns the updated employee.
  • DELETE /employees/{id}: Delete an employee by their ID.

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Optional<Employee>> getEmployeeById(@PathVariable org.bson.types.ObjectId id)
      Get an employee by id.
      Parameter:
      id - the ObjectId of the employee.
      Gibt zurück:
      an Optional of the Employee, which is empty if no employee was found.
